com.techgrains.service

Class TGImageRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.volley.Request<android.graphics.Bitmap>
      • com.android.volley.toolbox.ImageRequest
        • com.techgrains.service.TGImageRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<com.android.volley.Request<android.graphics.Bitmap>>

    public class TGImageRequest
extends com.android.volley.toolbox.ImageRequest
    TGImageRequest has been created by extending TGRequest which internally uses Volley framework. It fetches image provide back as Bitmap.
